tool_description: No. 1 rated U.S listed stock and options data provider with the lowest cost. The cloud-based API has a simple interface and returns easy-to-consume data in JSON format for options prices.

api_list.name: Options
api_list.description: Return Stock and Options Data for the given ticker symbol.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve options data.

api_list.name: Straddle
api_list.description: Return options data in straddle format for the specified ticker symbol.

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve straddle options data.
